vote.title: A resolution (1) declaring two properties unwanted and unneeded, and authorizing their advertisement for sale by public auction (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet); (2) establishing a reserve for the auctioned surplus properties; (3) authorizing a Purchase and Sale Agreement to be prepared for the auctioned surplus properties receiving the highest qualified bid that meets or exceeds the reserve; and (4) authorizing the conveyance of a deed in a form acceptable to the City Attorney - Estimated Revenue: TBD - Real Estate Market to determine the value
